Description: The type of phases that should be exported in the final DAT file. Note that ``'as_in_original_dat'`` is not implemented yet, but ``'as_in_settings'`` should behave the same way, provided that you alter no FieldMap.CavitySettings.reference attribute.
Not implemented yet. If we should use the Cython implementation (faster).
If the field maps phases should be absolute (no implicit rephasing after a failure).
Number of integrating steps per cavity cell. Recommended value is 40.
